Package io.github.coho04.dcbcore.discord.events

Class ButtonClickListener

java.lang.Object
net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
io.github.coho04.dcbcore.discord.events.ButtonClickListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.EventListener
public class ButtonClickListener extends net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
The ButtonClickListener class extends ListenerAdapter to handle button interactions. It manages pagination of message embeds using "prev" and "next" buttons.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    ButtonClickListener(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Message message, List<net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.MessageEmbed> pages, AtomicInteger currentPage, net.dv8tion.jda.api.interactions.components.buttons.Button prev, net.dv8tion.jda.api.interactions.components.buttons.Button next)
    Constructs a ButtonClickListener with the specified message, pages, current page, and buttons.

  • Constructor Details

    • ButtonClickListener

      public ButtonClickListener(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Message message, List<net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.MessageEmbed> pages, AtomicInteger currentPage, net.dv8tion.jda.api.interactions.components.buttons.Button prev, net.dv8tion.jda.api.interactions.components.buttons.Button next)
      Constructs a ButtonClickListener with the specified message, pages, current page, and buttons.
      Parameters:
      message - The message containing the buttons.
      pages - The list of message embeds representing the pages.
      currentPage - The current page index.
      prev - The button to navigate to the previous page.
      next - The button to navigate to the next page.

  • Method Details

      Handles button interactions to navigate through the pages.

      onButtonInteraction in class net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
      Parameters:
